data.name: Cornucopia
data.detailed_description:
Each New Game is Special and Unique for You. (Replay-ability)


Not just ordinary breaking rocks and chopping trees, in Cornucopia you can find hidden bonus items, so each swing is like a mini-game of discovery.



It's boring buying generic pets from the local farmer, in Cornucopia you have to attend a livestock auction to buy your animals, and they are all unique in their own way. Maybe you will get lucky and be able to bid on a rare genetics.



Sick of boring breeding systems? In Cornucopia you can breed new unique genetics for your cows and chickens, who knows what new combinations you will discover? Each new animal is a chance to discover their favorite and disliked food.



Each new play through is unique, discovering randomized favorite and disliked gifts. With 47 Diverse Characters, there's so many NPCs you'll never get bored building new relationships and uncovering their unique personalities.



Tired of people in town having their original room styles? Improve your relationships and they will trust you enough to be able to decorate their rooms to your liking.



Sick of being confined to one house? Buy additional properties and land - and decorate them; a beach home, a forest home and a mountain villa.

A Variety of New Fun Mini Games.


A more scientific approach to growing plants, in Cornucopia you need the proper fertilizer NPK levels to grow certain vegetables, get busy making compost and analyzing the soil with your Magnify Glass.



Sick of annoying fishing mini-games? Enjoy a super fun fishing mini-game where every hook is a easy yet rewarding experience.



Fun Cooking Mini-game. They say the fastest route to people’s hearts is their stomachs. Collect over 200 unique recipes from your friends.



Ever wanted to train your animals in a farming sim, like in Monster Rancher? Pull rocks and engage in mini-games so your pet can become a Racing Champion.



Fun and Interactive Arcade Games.



Deeper Quest Systems. Open card packs and get bonuses and power ups, like double jump, water all plants, scratch cards, card quests like killing 5 monsters or shipping 5 vegetables for bonus chests and cash rewards.



Bonus mini-game rooms make exploration more fun. Discover various types of bonus rooms.

Forget the Grind. Avoid the Repetition, Get Help and Automate.


Sick of the repetition? Automate, pay villagers to take care of your animals and water your crops while you are off adventuring.



Tired of adventuring and gathering resources and fighting solo? Let your animal do most of the work for you, while you sit back and enjoy.






Plant, Harvest and Ship Over 50 Vegetable Varieties.


Grow and Harvest 50+ Fruit Trees and 15+ Berry Bush Varieties.


All this and so much more. It’s time to get farming.

data.short_description: A heartwarming indie farming RPG. Grow crops, plant fruit trees and berry bushes, make friends, get married, raise and breed animals, pet assisted combat, card quests, fishing, racing, fun mini-games, a custom soundtrack and much more! Will you restore the Cornucopia?
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese, Dutch, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Swedish

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7+ / 8.1 / 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i3 Processor
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI 7770, Nvidia GeForce GTX 660 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i7 Processor
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX960+
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
